title: "Color / Moire" Portfolio Introduction
medium: Letterpress in black on heavy off-white wove paper
description: Introductory text page to portfolio fills center column of sheet.Text explains that the portfolio in question is a reprint of "Color in Line" published in 1960 and states the artist's objective: "to create both color interactions and design interactions, or 'moire,' by using one design in two colors, later overlapped."
name: text page
